Detailed Description

Allows for extended input and output options during decryption.

Property Documentation

◆ DisablePortionMarking

bool IonicSecurity::SDK::FileCryptoDecryptAttributes::DisablePortionMarking
getset

Indicate whether decryption (for OpenXML only) should skip checking for portion marked sections.

Parameters
[in]bDisablePortionMarkingFlag to indicate whether access denied page should be returned on error.

◆ ShouldProvideAccessDeniedPage

bool IonicSecurity::SDK::FileCryptoDecryptAttributes::ShouldProvideAccessDeniedPage
getset

Indicate whether access denied page object should be populated in the event that that an access denied error is encountered.

Parameters
[in]bProvideAccessDeniedPageFlag to indicate whether access denied page should be returned on error.
